categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Faradin was a male Human who served as a major in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. Serving on the planet Quesh during the Quesh war, Faradin was one of Moff Dracen's chief advisers.
Major Faradin appears on Quesh in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
